description.text:
Telescope Services AB har sedan 1999 jobbat med att rekrytera de fr√§msta mjukvaruspecialisterna fr√•n hela v√§rlden. V√•rt huvudkontor ligger i Lund, med rekryteringsnoder i mer √§n tio l√§nder, och vi √§r idag ca 100 medarbetare p√• plats h√§r i Sverige.
Requirements:
Fullstack developer with experience in frontend and backend
Professional experience from writing code in JavaScript, TypeScript, React
Frontend Frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js, Svelte, SvelteKit)
Ability to take ownership, identify requirements, prioritize and make progress in an environment with limited given input.
Fluent communication in English. Experience in cross team collaboration and communication.



Good to have:
GraphQL
State Management
Python
Fast API
Rest API
WebSockets
Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and/or Static Site Generation (SSG) techniques
Databases and Messages queues



Please send Your CV to jobs@telescopeservices.se.

Telescope Services AB har sedan 1999 jobbat med att rekrytera de fr√§msta mjukvaruspecialisterna fr√•n hela v√§rlden. V√•rt huvudkontor ligger i Lund, med rekryteringsnoder i mer √§n tio l√§nder, och vi √§r idag ca 100 medarbetare p√• plats h√§r i Sverige.

Requirements:

  • Fullstack developer with experience in frontend and backend
  • Professional experience from writing code in JavaScript, TypeScript, React
  • Frontend Frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js, Svelte, SvelteKit)
  • Ability to take ownership, identify requirements, prioritize and make progress in an environment with limited given input.
  • Fluent communication in English. Experience in cross team collaboration and communication.


Good to have:

  • GraphQL
  • State Management
  • Python
  • Fast API
  • Rest API
  • WebSockets
  • Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and/or Static Site Generation (SSG) techniques
  • Databases and Messages queues


Please send Your CV to jobs@telescopeservices.se.

description.text:
√Ñr du en erfaren Frontend utvecklare och √§r intresserad av att ta dig an ett sp√§nnande konsultuppdrag?
Aveer √§r en IT-konsultfirma som fokuserar p√• att tillhandah√•lla h√∂gkvalitativa konsulttj√§nster inom IT- och aff√§rsl√∂sningar till v√•ra klienter. Vi tror p√• att skapa en stimulerande arbetsmilj√∂ d√§r v√•ra medarbetare kan utvecklas och trivas samtidigt som de f√•r m√∂jlighet att arbeta p√• sp√§nnande projekt och utmaningar.
Konsultrollen hos Aveer passar perfekt f√∂r dig som tycker om det ansvar den medf√∂r, eftersom den ger dig m√∂jlighet att ta kontroll √∂ver din karri√§r och utveckling. Genom att vara en del av v√•rt team av konsulter f√•r du chansen att utforska olika branscher och uppdrag, samtidigt som du f√•r arbeta p√• sp√§nnande projekt d√§r din kompetens beh√∂vs. Din kompetens kommer att v√§rdes√§ttas och g√∂ra verklig skillnad f√∂r v√•ra kunder. Som anst√§lld hos Aveer har du f√∂rm√•gan att p√•verka dina uppdrag och d√§rigenom skapa en arbetsmilj√∂ som passar just dina intressen och ambitioner, samtidigt som du har m√∂jlighet att forts√§tta att utvecklas och v√§xa inom f√∂retaget.
 
Vem s√∂ker vi?Som person √§r du en lagspelare med ett positivt tankes√§tt och du √§r nyfiken p√• att ta dig an de olika utmaningarna inom frontend-utveckling. Vi tror att st√§ndiga f√∂rb√§ttringar ligger i din natur, du √§lskar kvalitet, till√•ter dig sj√§lv att bli inspirerad, har en "kan g√∂ra" attityd och √§r stolt √∂ver ditt arbete. Du tror p√• samarbete och interaktion mellan team och roller.

Kvalifikationer:
 En kandidatexamen eller magisterexamen i ingenj√∂rsvetenskap, datavetenskap, f√∂retagsekonomi eller motsvarande 
 En passion f√∂r IT
 En minst 10 √•rs relevant arbetslivserfarenhet
 Gedigna kunskaper i engelska
 Kunskaper i HTML5, JSON, CSS och JavaScript
 Kunskaper i polymer/lit/webbkomponenttekniker
 Kunskaper inom testramverk som Selenium/Robot/Mocha/Chai/WCT (Web Component Tester)
 Windows
 Android
 iOS
 Flytande i b√•de svenska och engelska (i tal och skrift).
 Metoder:Safe/Scrum
 Testdriven utveckling
 DevOps (DevOps)
 Kontinuerlig integration / Kontinuerlig leverans
 Verktyg: Visual Studio Code, GIT och SonarQube eller liknande kodt√§ckningsverktyg
 
F√∂rdelar med att vara hos Aveer
 Variation i uppdrag:Som konsult f√•r du m√∂jlighet att v√§lja och p√•verka dina uppdrag, vilket ger dig variation och m√∂jlighet att bredda din erfarenhet inom olika branscher och projekt.
Efterfr√•gan p√• din kompetens: Din kompetens √§r h√∂gt efterfr√•gad, vilket inneb√§r att du kommer att vara i en position d√§r din kunskap och erfarenhet v√§rderas h√∂gt av b√•de Aveer och v√•ra klienter.
Konkurrenskraftig l√∂n:Hos oss finns enbart experter och vi ser till att din ers√§ttning reflekterar den h√∂ga niv√•n av kompetens och erfarenhet du besitter inom din bransch.

Aveer, ett dynamiskt IT-konsultf√∂retag som just nu p√• en sp√§nnande tillv√§xtresa och vi s√∂ker nu v√•ra n√§sta experter inom IT. Vi fr√§mjar innovation och anser att inga id√©er √§r f√∂r stora. Eftersom vi verkar inom IT-sektorn √§r det ingen hemlighet att vi √§lskar tech och innovativa l√∂sningar. D√§rf√∂r f√∂rv√§ntar vi oss att du delar samma ambitioner och inte √§r r√§dd f√∂r att utforska nya v√§gar och tillv√§gag√•ngss√§tt.

Bemannings-/rekryterings-bolag samt underkonsulter undanbedes.

description.text:
Oneflow builds a SaaS contract automation platform to help businesses modernize the legacy way of working with contracts. Oneflow has since April 2022 traded on Stockholm‚Äôs Nasdaq First North Premier Growth Market and is a rapidly growing tech scale-up located in the heart of Stockholm. We have created a platform that automates the entire contract process from start to finish, all in one place. Turning clunky, static contracts into helpful, truly digital contracts that feel like magic.
The team
We are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to work on our Oneflow product, a platform that makes it easier to create, send and sign digital documents using electronic signatures. Our teams focus on collaborative problem-solving, valuing open discussions and data-driven decisions to guide their approach, continuously improving our users experience. We encourage our developers to take a strong sense of ownership in their work, knowing that their contributions have a significant impact. Furthermore our developers are involved in every stage of the product development, from feature planning to release, ensuring they have a direct role in shaping our product's success.
Who you are
As a Senior Frontend Developer at Oneflow, you will play a key role in developing and improving our web applications, taking ownership and accountability for the creation of new features and the improvement of existing ones. We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced individual with a strong background in React and Node.js who can ensure that our product meets customer needs while maintaining high performance and reliability. You will lead by example, setting and maintaining best practices while actively coaching your teammates. You will collaborate closely as a Product Trio - developer(s), Product Manager(s) and UX designer(s) - in all stages of product development, from discovery to follow-up and optimisation of released capabilities. Besides proficiency in general frontend development, a deep understanding of Javascript module bundlers and build pipelines in CI/CD environments is essential. Additionally, experience with testing frameworks and tools is required.
Your background
Strong proficiency in React and Node.js.
Extensive experience with Webpack (or similar) for module bundling.
Expertise in testing with Jest, Enzyme, and React Testing Library.
Experience with setting up and maintaining build pipelines in CI/CD.
Technologies to work with
React
Node.js
Webpack
Jest
Enzyme
React Testing Library
Playwright
We also value if you have an interest in either of these areas:
Docker and infrastructure-related scripts.
Setting up and managing infrastructure-related tasks and automation.
How we work
Our team and culture are built on this principle of inclusion and responsibility, which we see as crucial in building a great product.
We strive for a truly agile development environment that promotes getting things done, rather than focusing too much on processes and enterprise tools. This means we typically work in short iterations, regularly going from conceptual discussions to shipped product features in a few weeks. We believe early and honest feedback is the best feedback, both internally and from our customers.
Come work with us
We value gender equality and diversity in organization, so we strive for a team that reflects the diversity in today's society. At Oneflow we encourage and welcome applicants who are people of color, LGBTQI+, people with disabilities and those without a college degree. Our recruitment is based on competence.
The recruitment process starts with an interview with Aleksandra from the People & Culture team. After that, you will complete a personality and logic test, then prepare an assignment before your final interview with Sorin, the hiring manager.
Please submit your CV in English. 
We‚Äôre excited to meet you! üíú

We‚Äôre excited to meet you! üíú

description.text:
Jobbify √§r en jobbplattform f√∂r vassa kandidater.
F√∂r kunds r√§kning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
üöÄ Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a¬†3D Frontend Developer üöÄ


Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our¬†
About VIPAS :

Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals‚Äîefficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that‚Äôs exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don‚Äôt just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

¬†
Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer who possesses extensive knowledge in React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript. The ideal candidate will be proficient in using Docker containers to streamline development processes and have familiarity with CI/CD deployments and GitHub for efficient project management. Knowledge of 3D skills, or game development skills, along with knowledge of Three.js, will be considered a strong advantage. We would love to have a optimistic high drive developer to follow our very active 3D team.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain responsive and high-performance web applications using React and TypeScript.

Utilize Docker to create, deploy, and manage containerized applications, ensuring consistency across various environments.

Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes, improving development efficiency and product quality.

Collaborate with DevOps teams to deploy and manage applications within OpenShift clusters, ensuring scalable and reliable infrastructure.

Utilize Three.js for developing and integrating advanced 3D graphics into web applications (if applicable).

Work closely with cross-functional teams, including pipeline developers, backend developers, 3D designers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality solutions on time.


¬†

Requirements:

Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience with React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript (Node/Express)

Familiarity with Docker containers, including creating, deploying, and managing containerized applications using Docker CLI and Docker Compose.

Familiarity with CI/CD tools and processes, such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or similar platforms.

Experience with GitHub for version control and collaboration.

Familiarity with Azure stack, Azure functions, CosmosDB, Azure Busses, etc.


¬†
Education and Experience:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

4+ years of professional experience in frontend development.


¬†
Required skills 

React

Docker

Azure Stack

Docker Compose

Jenkins

Docker CLI

Javascript

Azure Functions

EXPRESS

Github

Typescript

Node

CosmosDB

CI/CD


¬†
Preferred skills 

3D graphics

game development

3D Modelling

Web Applications

3d Rendering


¬†
Languages 

English (Proficient)


¬†
¬†
Why Join Us?

Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikf√∂retagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you‚Äôre driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.

You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!

Apply Now &¬†Please feel free to reach me at sushilkumar@vipas.se

Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.


How to Apply:

Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikf√∂retagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you‚Äôre driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!

description.text_formatted:
Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a3D Frontend Developer Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our

About VIPAS :

Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals‚Äîefficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that‚Äôs exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don‚Äôt just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer who possesses extensive knowledge in React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript. The ideal candidate will be proficient in using Docker containers to streamline development processes and have familiarity with CI/CD deployments and GitHub for efficient project management. Knowledge of 3D skills, or game development skills, along with knowledge of Three.js, will be considered a strong advantage. We would love to have a optimistic high drive developer to follow our very active 3D team.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain responsive and high-performance web applications using React and TypeScript.
  • Utilize Docker to create, deploy, and manage containerized applications, ensuring consistency across various environments.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes, improving development efficiency and product quality.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to deploy and manage applications within OpenShift clusters, ensuring scalable and reliable infrastructure.
  • Utilize Three.js for developing and integrating advanced 3D graphics into web applications (if applicable).
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams, including pipeline developers, backend developers, 3D designers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality solutions on time.

Requirements:

  • Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience with React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript (Node/Express)
  • Familiarity with Docker containers, including creating, deploying, and managing containerized applications using Docker CLI and Docker Compose.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD tools and processes, such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or similar platforms.
  • Experience with GitHub for version control and collaboration.
  • Familiarity with Azure stack, Azure functions, CosmosDB, Azure Busses, etc.

Education and Experience:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4+ years of professional experience in frontend development.

Required skills

  • React
  • Docker
  • Azure Stack
  • Docker Compose
  • Jenkins
  • Docker CLI
  • Javascript
  • Azure Functions
  • EXPRESS
  • Github
  • Typescript
  • Node
  • CosmosDB
  • CI/CD

Preferred skills

  • 3D graphics
  • game development
  • 3D Modelling
  • Web Applications
  • 3d Rendering

Languages

  • English (Proficient)

Why Join Us?

Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikf√∂retagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you‚Äôre driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.

You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!

Apply Now &Please feel free to reach me at sushilkumar@vipas.se

Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!

Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

We are currently seeking a skilled and experienced Frontend Developer to join our team.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and improve web applications to enhance overall functionality.
  • Ensure clean and maintainable code, adhering to best practices in development.
  • Build and implement interactive user-facing components with Vue.js;
  • Participate in the application architecture design and decision-making process;
  • Test, debug, and fix bugs in the code;
  • Collaborate with designers and backend developers to ensure smooth application workflow;

Qualifications

  • 4+ years of experience in frontend development and 2+ year of hands-on experience with Vue.js;
  • Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript;
  • Experience with version control systems (Git);
  • Proficiency in CSS preprocessors (SASS, LESS);
  • Familiarity with modern build tools (Webpack, Vite);
  • Understanding of UI/UX design principles and ability to work from design mockups;

We offer:

  • An exciting and dynamic work environment where you will have the opportunity to grow and develop.
  • The chance to work on innovative projects and with modern technology.
  • Flexible working hours.
  • Competitive salary and benefits.

description.text:
About CarlaAt Carla, we believe that more people should be able to drive electric vehicles. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre building the safest, most convenient, and transparent way to buy, sell, or lease an electric car online. Founded in 2020 in Stockholm with strong VC backing, Carla is now in an exciting growth phase.
 About the RoleWe are seeking a talented and motivated senior level Frontend Engineer to join our Product / Tech team. Our team is all about crafting software that feels natural, honest, and joyful to use. We care deeply about the details of usability, accessibility, and performance, and we work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that the products we build support our business objectives. As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will play a key role in disrupting the used car industry by envisioning and implementing ambitious software solutions, both for our internal and external users.
 The development team is remote-first (EU timezone only), and this is primarily a fully remote position. If you live in Stockholm, Sweden, you are also more than welcome to work from the office. Let us know what works best for you!
What you‚Äôll get to do:
  Develop our internal applications written in ReScript as well as our public facing website running Next.js and TypeScript. 
 Contribute to all stages in the product development cycle: design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
 Build software in a cross functional team with UX, design, product and engineering working together as one.
 Learn and grow your wider skills from senior colleagues across many disciplines / departments at a startup where you can stay close to the entire business.
 
Who we look for:
  At least 5+ years of working experience as a frontend engineer
 A plus if you have experience with ReScript or any other functional programming language
 Skilled in React 
 Curiosity to learn new tools, technologies and languages
 A good communicator. Enjoys discussing different solutions to solve technical as well as UX problems
 Empathy. The ambition and will to empower the people around you, a mindset of leading through example
 
Some of the technologies we work with
  ReScript for our internal system called BackOffice
 TypeScript and Javascript - for our external website on carla.se
 React
 Next.js
 Relay
 GraphQL
 CSS/HTML
 
What is in it for you?Most of all, this is a fantastic opportunity to work for a category-defining company, with great values, and a business model that doesn't talk about sustainability - but is based on it.Apart from that we offer:
 Joining one of Sweden‚Äôs LinkedIn 2022 & 2023 Top 10 Startups
 A career-defining role at an early-stage startup and an opportunity to grow and learnfrom knowledgeable co-workers
 We‚Äôre a start-up, which means we work smarter, not harder. Life-work balance still plays an important role in creating long-lasting productivity and output
 A workplace that believes strength is found in diversity. We hire people regardless of background, education, experience or gender
 Market competitive salary and stock option program
 GraphQL
 CSS/HTML
 
So, If you are looking to join a capable and collaborative team and directly impact both product quality and team effectiveness, apply today! We‚Äôre fast, both in terms of recruitment and when it comes to growing our business. We have no plans on stopping anytime soon, and hopefully, this is where you come in!For this role, we are primarily looking for a candidate that is based in Stockholm looking for a hybrid remote role, but we do also welcome international applications.
Please submit your application by including your CV, LinkedIn, GitHub or Portfolio.

description.text:
Veritaz is a leading IT staffing solutions provider in Sweden, committed to advancing individual careers and aiding employers in securing the perfect talent fit. With a proven track record of successful partnerships with top companies, we have rapidly grown our presence in the USA, Europe, and Sweden as a dependable and trusted resource within the IT industry.
Assignment Description:
We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team.
What you‚Äôll do:
Design and implement new views and features using TypeScript, React, and Styled Components.
Collaborate closely with the app development team, including developers and designers, to ensure a cohesive user experience.
Interact with operating system features via Electron APIs, including tray icons, autostart functionality, and persistent settings management.
Utilize Inter-Process Communication (IPC) within Electron and perform Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) to communicate with the app‚Äôs system service.
Contribute to upstream open-source projects to enhance the community and the application.
Maintain a strong focus on security in both code development and the development process, including supply chain security and code signing.
Explore opportunities to learn and work with Rust, Kotlin, TypeScript, and other technologies to enhance the application across different platforms.

What you bring:
Extensive experience (5+ years) in web technologies, particularly TypeScript and React.
Proven proficiency in CSS and Node.js.
Strong communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
Interest and/or experience in networking and security practices is a plus.
A collaborative mindset with the ability to bring innovative ideas to the team.

description.text:
Xensam: SAM DisruptersXensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We‚Äôre looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
Join our dynamic team as we develop the next generation Software Asset Management platform. We are a forward-thinking company that values innovation, collaboration, and a passion for technology. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality software solutions that meet the evolving needs of our clients.
About the roleWe are seeking a Senior Frontend Developer with expertise in React and Node.js. The ideal candidate will also have some experience with PostgreSQL and a strong desire to write maintainable and efficient code. This role requires a self-sufficient, driven individual who takes pride in their work and is eager to help other team members when needed. A positive attitude and passion for coding are essential.
Responsibilities
  Develop and Implement: Design and build user interface components using React.js and Node.js, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
   Collaborate: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and database developers, to create seamless and engaging user experiences.
   Optimize: Continuously improve application performance and scalability, utilizing best practices and modern technologies.
  Mentor: Provide guidance and support to junior developers, fostering a collaborative and learning-focused environment.
   Maintain Code Quality: Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
   Innovate: Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements and new features.
 
Qualifications
 5+ years of professional experience in frontend development with React and Node.js. Also experience with modern development tools and environments, such as Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms.
 Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and popular React.js workflows, preferably Mobx.
 Familiarity with PostgreSQL and experience integrating it into applications.
 Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.
 Strong verbal and written communication skills in fluent English and Swedish, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
 Ability to work effectively in a team environment, with a willingness to share knowledge and support others.
 Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile team.
 
What we offer
 A dynamic role that focuses on "freedom under responsibility"
 3 days in-office schedule (remote Mondays & Fridays)
 A generous work culture with free access to beverages & snacks, gym, bi-weekly massages at the office, shuffleboard, and other games etc.
 If sales targets are met, an annual destination trip awaits all employees
 Work with a diverse group driven by ambition as well as having fun together with different activities
 Great opportunity to influence your career development as well as the company's
 Work with the latest technology in the fastest-growing SAM software in the market
 
At Xensam, our core values define our workplace atmosphere:
REBELLIOUS We foster a rebellious spirit, promoting freedom within responsibilities and encouraging initiative.
HUMANE Our team promotes a caring, inclusive environment where diversity is valued, and individuals are respected and empowered to be themselves.
HARMONIOUS We prioritize harmony, valuing work-life balance, and creating a pleasant atmosphere.
Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and caring workplace. If you're a team player eager to grow professionally, APPLY now!

description.text:
Veritaz is a leading IT staffing solutions provider in Sweden, committed to advancing individual careers and aiding employers in securing the perfect talent fit. With a proven track record of successful partnerships with top companies, we have rapidly grown our presence in the USA, Europe, and Sweden as a dependable and trusted resource within the IT industry.
Assignment Description:
We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team.
What you will work on:
Develop software following client guidelines and industry best practices.
Design and implement features, enhancements, and bug fixes for frontend applications primarily using TypeScript.
Conduct code reviews and write unit tests to ensure code quality.
Collaborate on backend development tasks, particularly with Go and Python.
Implement features that adhere to IT security requirements.
Utilize tools to visualize data effectively.
Share your expertise and knowledge within the team and across the organization.
Foster a positive and collaborative team environment.

What you bring:
A minimum of 7 years of experience in software development.
Degree in a relevant field or equivalent professional experience.
Extensive experience in frontend development, particularly with TypeScript/JavaScript and reactive frontend frameworks.
Previous experience in UX design, focusing on intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Experience with Go and Python.
Background in software architecture and backend development.
Strong business acumen and customer focus.
Experience working in an international environment.
Structured approach to work and strong analytical skills.
Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Experience in software security and DevSecOps practices.
Experience in the defense industry or with clients like Ericsson is highly desirable.
